name: chicken
description: Come and discover our special chicken grill and roast. We offer a selection of home made marinades with fresh spices.

name: beef
description: The masterpiece of a BBQ, cooked as you want it. Our beef is produced in Sweden and Argentina.

name: drinks
description: Wild & The Moon drinks are vegan and homemade. We do not use refined sugars, additives, preservatives, GMOs, gluten or dairy products.
